short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark code which has been read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you remember which code you have read.

# Why
1. You are just interested in part of code for now and probably go back to this repository in future.
2. You need to jump between files backwards and forwards.

# How
option 1. Click line number left on the codebase (currently support Github).
option 2. Select the code  you already read it.
